name: Meetic Group, A Match Group Company
membership:
FEVAD and E-Commerce Europe. 
Online Dating Association.
goal:
Match Group is the Global Leader of Online Dating with a community of over 20 million thanks to a portfolio of over 45 brands available in nearly every country in the world, including leading properties like Match.com, OkCupid, OurTime, Meetic Group, Twoo, Tinder, PeopleMedia and ParPerfeito.
In Europe, Match Group operates through Meetic-Group, the leading European company of dating products, with a portfolio of over 7 brands in 15 countries and 13 languages including Meetic, Match, Love Scout 24 and Lexa. Meetic-Group is also the first Events planner with over than 160 Events/month and 370 000 attendees in more than 190 Europeans cities.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digital Economy, Data, e-privacy, Online Platform, Online payments, Online contracts, Consumer law.
